remaining sw as a single stitch working the body of the fish where your bor marker is located is the bottom of the fish this will help hide any color joins i recommend after working a few rounds that you tie a small scrap of yarn on the outside of the work to remind you later that this is the bottom of the fish and don t put the dorsal fin on this side
